data.oai_dc:dc: Stratigraphic variation in carbon-isotope values for pedogenic carbonates and organic matter from the Lourinhã and Morrison formations. (A) Pedogenic carbonates from northern section of Lourinhã formation, (B) Pedogenic carbonates from southern section of Lourinhã formation, (C) Pedogenic carbonates from Ghost Ranch section of Morrison Formation, (D) Pedogenic carbonates from Shell section of Morrison Formation, (E) Organic matter from northern section of Lourinhã formation, (F) Organic matter from southern section of Lourinhã formation.
